text: Hello everyone. Remember today is effectively the last day to submit your JuliaCon talks. 1 day and 10 hours remaining. And remember if you have a quick story to share - there are lightning talks and posters. <https://pretalx.com/juliacon2021/cfp>

elements.text: Hello everyone. Remember today is effectively the last day to submit your JuliaCon talks. 1 day and 10 hours remaining. And remember if you have a quick story to share - there are lightning talks and posters.

text:
I am currently porting an R package to Julia for topic in mathematical biology. I was hoping to submit a small paper on the methodology (even through the original methodology from the R package is already published).

Is this something that can be accepted for the Proceedings? And is that deadline tomorrow as well?

elements.text:
I am currently porting an R package to Julia for topic in mathematical biology. I was hoping to submit a small paper on the methodology (even through the original methodology from the R package is already published).

Is this something that can be accepted for the Proceedings? And is that deadline tomorrow as well?

text: Yes, it would be acceptable for proceedings, but <@U67BJLYCS> may have to say about proceedings deadline. I am quite sure it is not tomorrow (but don’t quote me on it).

elements.text: Yes, it would be acceptable for proceedings, but
may have to say about proceedings deadline. I am quite sure it is not tomorrow (but don’t quote me on it).

text: Proceedings deadline is in September, see <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/juliacon-2021-proceedings/55354>

attachments.title: JuliaCon 2021 Proceedings
attachments.text: Hi everyone, as indicated by the recent call for proposals here on discourse we are slowly approaching JuliaCon 2021. On behalf of the editorial board, it is my pleasure to announce that, for the third time in a row, there will be JuliaCon conference proceedings! For presenters at JuliaCon this means the opportunity to submit supplementary articles next to their talk or poster contributions which, after passing through an open peer-review process, will be published in our academic journal. Gen...
